checkInOut.question: What is the standard check-in time at Safa Residency Hotel?
checkInOut.answer: The standard check-in time is 14:00 Hours (2:00 PM). During check-in, credit card pre-authorization will be taken by the Front Office. For cash payments, full cash payment must be made during check-in time.

airport.question: Does Safa Residency Hotel offer Airport transfers?
airport.answer: Yes, we offer both limousine and shuttle services. The hotel is conveniently located just a 3-minute drive from Hazrat Shahjalal International Airport, making airport transfers quick and easy.

breakfast.question: Does Safa Residency offer breakfast?
breakfast.answer: Yes, guests can enjoy a delightful start to their day with delicious breakfast options that cater to diverse tastes. Breakfast is complimentary with our rooms.

amenities.question: What room amenities are available?
amenities.answer: We offer a range of amenities including: Welcome fruit basket, daily bottled mineral water (2x 500ml), local newspaper, makeup mirror, in-house doctor, wake-up call service, Free Wi-Fi, Dry Cleaning Service, Room Service, Daily Housekeeping, and Service Request facility.

carRental.question: Is it possible to rent a car during my stay?
carRental.answer: Yes, our dedicated team can arrange a car on demand. Please contact the hotel prior to or upon your arrival to arrange car rental.

reservation.question: How can I make a hotel reservation?
reservation.answer: You can make a reservation by visiting our website, sending an email to info@safaresidency.com, or calling +8801831-335222. Our team is eager to assist you in planning your stay.

cancellation.question: What is the cancellation policy for individual bookings?
cancellation.answer: Cancellations must be made 48 hours prior to check-in. Cancellations after this period will incur a charge of one room night. In case of a no-show, one night's room charge will be applicable.

groupBooking.question: What is the cancellation policy for group bookings?
groupBooking.answer: Group booking is defined as 5 paying rooms or 10 paying guests. Cancellation policy varies: No charge if cancelled 21 days prior, 50% charge if cancelled 20 days prior, and 100% charge if cancelled within 10 days of check-in.

specialDates.question: Are there special policies for holiday or event dates?
specialDates.answer: On premium dates like Eid Holiday, Durga Puja, Christmas Holiday, or long government holidays, group booking cancellation policy may be non-cancellable and non-refundable as per specific agreement.

paymentPolicy.question: What is the payment policy?
paymentPolicy.answer: Room rates are subject to 10% Service Charge and 15% VAT. Advance payment is required for total estimated bill. With prior credit approval, payment must be made within two weeks of service. After two weeks, a 5% monthly interest will be charged on outstanding amounts.

refundPolicy.question: What is the refund policy?
refundPolicy.answer: If cancellation complies with policy, refunds are processed within 15 working days to the booker's bank account/card or via cheque. Processing time depends on credit card and bank procedures.

creditFacilities.question: Do you offer credit facilities?
creditFacilities.answer: Credit facilities are not applicable without a prior written agreement. All communication regarding reservations, cancellations, changes, and billing must be made in writing.

familyStay.question: Is Safa Residency suitable for families?
familyStay.answer: Yes, Safa Residency Hotel is suitable for families, offering amenities and activities designed for children to enjoy during their stay.

banquetCapacity.question: What is the banquet capacity at Safa Residency Hotel?
banquetCapacity.answer: The specific banquet capacity is not detailed in the provided document. It is recommended to contact the hotel directly for exact capacity information.

eventDuration.question: What is the maximum dismantle period for event arrangements?
eventDuration.answer: The maximum dismantle period for banners, stages, or special arrangements is 2 hours after the event.

paymentPolicy.question: What is the payment policy for events?
paymentPolicy.answer: Advance payment is required for the total estimated bill to confirm the banquet program. For credit-approved reservations, payment must be made within two weeks of availing services. After two weeks, a 5% monthly interest will be charged on the outstanding bill amount.

cancellationPolicy.question: What is the cancellation policy for events?
cancellationPolicy.answer: No cancellation charge if cancelled 21 days prior to the event. 50% of the projected bill will be charged if cancelled 20 days prior. 100% of the projected bill will be charged if cancelled within 10 days of the event. On special dates like holidays, cancellation policy may be non-refundable.

taxesAndCharges.question: What taxes and service charges are applied to event bookings?
taxesAndCharges.answer: Food rates are subject to a 10% Service Charge and 15% VAT, calculated at a compound rate of 25%. If government tax structures change, the new structure will be applicable.
